results.name: Smallest number of integer-sided squares needed to tile a 7 X n rectangle.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,0,0,1,-1)
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[x*(x^8 - x^7 - 4*x^6 - 2*x + 7)/(x^8 - x^7 - x + 1), {x, 0, 100}], x] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 15 2017 *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 12 2013
